item.description:
Come to Kimball Farms in Westford MA for a fun outdoor "cruise night" with hundreds of antique cars, from Corvettes to Model T's to browse & gawk at while enjoying the entertainment of "The Reminisants" band playing your favorite oldies music from the '50s & '60s.
http://www.reminisant...
Plus a delicious BBQ grill and legendary ice cream sundae buffet thats impossible to resist.

What better way is there to spend a summer evening. So dust off the fuzzy dice and come on down to Cruise Night at Kimball Farm.

Admission only $3.00, parking is Free.

NOTE: this event is "weather permitting", watch for updates the day of the event OR If in doubt call Kimballs Farm 978-486-3891.

* you may want to bring a lawn chair or blanket, and bug spray.
item.how_to_find_us: table with meetup sign, at hopefully one of the picnic tables closest to the stage/band.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: "Ultimate Cruise Night" + Boston's Best Oldies Band!
